Token.Abstract: XMMEnduserApi is the main part of the xamoom-ios-sdk. You can use it to send api request to the xamoom-api.
The preferred language of the user.
The preferred language of the user.
The preferred language of the user.
String with the title of the qr code view cancel button.
String with the title of the qr code view cancel button.
String with the title of the qr code view cancel button.
A shared instance from XMMEnduserApi.
RKObjectManager used to make calls to api.
RKObjectManager used to make calls to api.
RKObjectManager used to make calls to api.
Inits the XMMEnduserApi: sets the apiBaseUrl and gets the preferred systemLanguage.
Set your API Key from the xamoom-system.

Parameter.Name: apiKey
Parameter.Abstract: The API key from your xamoom system

Token.Abstract: Makes an api call to xamoom with a unique contentId. If the selected language is not available the default language will be returned.
Token.Declaration: - (void)contentWithContentId:(NSString *)contentId includeStyle:(BOOL)style includeMenu:(BOOL)menu withLanguage:(NSString *)language full:(BOOL)full preview:(BOOL)preview completion:(void ( ^ ) ( XMMContentById *result ))completionHandler error:(void ( ^ ) ( XMMError *error ))errorHandler

Parameter.Name: contentId
Parameter.Abstract: The id of the content from xamoom backend

Parameter.Name: style
Parameter.Abstract: True or False for returning the style from xamoom backend as XMMStyle

Parameter.Name: menu
Parameter.Abstract: True or False for returning the menu from xamoom backend as Array of XMMMenuItem

Parameter.Name: language
Parameter.Abstract: The requested language of the content from xamoom backend

Parameter.Name: full
Parameter.Abstract: True or false for returning "unsynced" data or not

Parameter.Name: preview
Parameter.Abstract: If YES it won't show up in statistics.

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract:
CompletionHandler returns the result
- param1 result The result from xamoom backend as XMMContentById

Parameter.Name: errorHandler
Parameter.Abstract:
ErrorHandler returns an error if one occures
- param1 error A XMMError with error informations

Token.Abstract: Makes an api call to xamoom with a unique locationIdentifier (code saved on NFC or QR). If the selected language is not available the default language will be returned.
Token.Declaration: - (void)contentWithLocationIdentifier:(NSString *)locationIdentifier majorId:(NSString *)majorId includeStyle:(BOOL)style includeMenu:(BOOL)menu withLanguage:(NSString *)language completion:(void ( ^ ) ( XMMContentByLocationIdentifier *result ))completionHandler error:(void ( ^ ) ( XMMError *error ))errorHandler

Parameter.Name: locationIdentifier
Parameter.Abstract: The locationidentifier (code saved on NFC or QR) of the marker from xamoom backend

Parameter.Name: majorId
Parameter.Abstract: BeaconMajor, only when you use a beacon.

Parameter.Name: style
Parameter.Abstract: True or False for returning the style from xamoom backend as XMMStyle

Parameter.Name: menu
Parameter.Abstract: True of False for returning the menu from xamoom backend as Array of XMMMenuItem

Parameter.Name: language
Parameter.Abstract: The requested language of the content from xamoom backend

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract:
CompletionHandler returns the result
- param1 result The result from xamoom backend as XMMContentByLocationIdentifier

Parameter.Name: errorHandler
Parameter.Abstract:
ErrorHandler returns an error if one occures
- param1 error A XMMError with error informations

Token.Abstract: Makes an api call to xamoom with a location (lat & lon). If the selected language is not available the default language will be returned.
Token.Declaration: - (void)contentWithLat:(NSString *)lat withLon:(NSString *)lon withLanguage:(NSString *)language completion:(void ( ^ ) ( XMMContentByLocation *result ))completionHandler error:(void ( ^ ) ( XMMError *error ))errorHandler

Parameter.Name: lat
Parameter.Abstract: The latitude of a location

Parameter.Name: lon
Parameter.Abstract: The longitude of a location

Parameter.Name: language
Parameter.Abstract: The requested language of the content from xamoom backend

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract:
CompletionHandler returns the result
- param1 result The result from xamoom backend as XMMContentByLocation

Parameter.Name: errorHandler
Parameter.Abstract:
ErrorHandler returns an error if one occures
- param1 error A XMMError with error informations

Token.Abstract: Makes an api call to xamoom with params to get a list of all items, so you can show them on a map
Token.Declaration: - (void)spotMapWithMapTags:(NSArray *)mapTags withLanguage:(NSString *)language includeContent:(BOOL)includeContent completion:(void ( ^ ) ( XMMSpotMap *result ))completionHandler error:(void ( ^ ) ( XMMError *error ))errorHandler

Parameter.Name: mapTags
Parameter.Abstract: The tags of the wanted spots

Parameter.Name: language
Parameter.Abstract: The requested language of the content from xamoom backend

Parameter.Name: includeContent
Parameter.Abstract: Will return contentId of spots with assigned content if YES

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract:
CompletionHandler returns the result
- param1 result The result from xamoom backend as XMMSpotMap

Parameter.Name: errorHandler
Parameter.Abstract:
ErrorHandler returns an error if one occures
- param1 error A XMMError with error informations

Token.Abstract: Makes an api call to xamoom with a unique contentId. If the selected language is not available the default language will be returned.
Token.Declaration: - (void)contentListWithPageSize:(int)pageSize withLanguage:(NSString *)language withCursor:(NSString *)cursor withTags:(NSArray *)tags completion:(void ( ^ ) ( XMMContentList *result ))completionHandler error:(void ( ^ ) ( XMMError *error ))errorHandler

Parameter.Name: pageSize
Parameter.Abstract: Number of items you will get returned

Parameter.Name: language
Parameter.Abstract: The requested language of the content from xamoom backend

Parameter.Name: cursor
Parameter.Abstract: Cursor for paging

Parameter.Name: tags
Parameter.Abstract: Tags as an array

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract:
CompletionHandler returns the result
- param1 result The result from xamoom backend as XMMContentList

Parameter.Name: errorHandler
Parameter.Abstract:
ErrorHandler returns an error if one occures
- param1 error A XMMError with error informations

Token.Abstract: Makes an api call to xamoom with a location and returns the closest spots. If the selected language is not available the default language will be returned.
Token.Declaration: - (void)closestSpotsWithLat:(float)lat withLon:(float)lon withRadius:(int)radius withLimit:(int)limit withLanguage:(NSString *)language completion:(void ( ^ ) ( XMMClosestSpot *result ))completionHandler error:(void ( ^ ) ( XMMError *error ))errorHandler

Parameter.Name: lat
Parameter.Abstract: Latitude

Parameter.Name: lon
Parameter.Abstract: Longitude

Parameter.Name: radius
Parameter.Abstract: Radius in decimenter

Parameter.Name: limit
Parameter.Abstract: Limit of the results

Parameter.Name: language
Parameter.Abstract: The requested language of the content from xamoom backend

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract:
CompletionHandler returns the result
- param1 result The result from xamoom backend as XMMClosestSpot

Parameter.Name: errorHandler
Parameter.Abstract:
ErrorHandler returns an error if one occures
- param1 error A XMMError with error informations

Token.Abstract: Makes an api call to xamoom when a user clicks a geofenced content for analytics.
Token.Declaration: - (void)geofenceAnalyticsMessageWithRequestedLanguage:(NSString *)requestedLanguage withDeliveredLanguage:(NSString *)deliveredLanguage withSystemId:(NSString *)systemId withSystemName:(NSString *)systemName withContentId:(NSString *)contentId withContentName:(NSString *)contentName withSpotId:(NSString *)spotId withSpotName:(NSString *)spotName

Parameter.Name: requestedLanguage
Parameter.Abstract: The language you requested from the xamoom system

Parameter.Name: deliveredLanguage
Parameter.Abstract: The language you got from the xamoom system

Parameter.Name: systemId
Parameter.Abstract: The systemId you got from the xamoom system

Parameter.Name: systemName
Parameter.Abstract: The systemName you got from the xamoom system

Parameter.Name: contentId
Parameter.Abstract: The contentId you got from the xamoom system

Parameter.Name: contentName
Parameter.Abstract: The contentName you got from the xamoom system

Parameter.Name: spotId
Parameter.Abstract: The spotId you got from the system

Parameter.Name: spotName
Parameter.Abstract: The spotName you got from the system

Token.Abstract: Post to xamoom enduser-api.
Token.Declaration: - (void)apiPostWithPath:(NSString *)path andDescriptor:(RKResponseDescriptor *)descriptor andParams:(NSDictionary *)params completion:(void ( ^ ) ( id result ))completionHandler error:(void ( ^ ) ( XMMError *error ))errorHandler

Parameter.Name: path
Parameter.Abstract: Enduser-api path

Parameter.Name: descriptor
Parameter.Abstract: RKResponseDescriptor

Parameter.Name: params
Parameter.Abstract: Parameters as NSDictionary

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract: A completionHandler block

Parameter.Name: errorHandler
Parameter.Abstract: A errorhandler block

Token.Abstract: Get to xamoom enduser-api.
Token.Declaration: - (void)apiGetWithPath:(NSString *)path andDescriptor:(RKResponseDescriptor *)descriptor andParams:(NSDictionary *)params completion:(void ( ^ ) ( id result ))completionHandler error:(void ( ^ ) ( XMMError *error ))errorHandler

Parameter.Name: path
Parameter.Abstract: Enduser-api path

Parameter.Name: descriptor
Parameter.Abstract: RKResponseDescriptor

Parameter.Name: params
Parameter.Abstract: Paramters as NSDicationary

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract: A completionHandler block

Parameter.Name: errorHandler
Parameter.Abstract: A errorhandler block

Token.Abstract: Starts the QRCodeReaderViewController to scan qr codes.

Parameter.Name: viewController
Parameter.Abstract: The ViewController from where you want to call the QRCodeReader (usually self)

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract: CompletionHandler returns the result - param1 locationIdentifier NSString with only the locaitionIdentifier of the scanned QR - param2 url NSString wiht the complete scanned url

Token.Abstract: Will return an url with http:// if there is none. Returns url without changes if there is a http:// or https:// as prefix.

Parameter.Name: URL
Parameter.Abstract: Url like "http://xm.gl/0ana0"

ReturnValue.Abstract: Returns an url with http:// in front.

Token.Abstract: Returns the LocationIdentifier, when you enter an url with locationIdentifier like "http://xm.gl/0ana0".

Parameter.Name: URL
Parameter.Abstract: A http://xm.gl/* url.
